titleStmt.title: His Maiesties letter to the Right Honourable the Lord Major, aldermen and Common-Councell of the city of London.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: With royal arms on recto of first leaf; verso is blank.
